intro: <0>Automatic Scanners<1>Automatic Scanners are Genshin tools that can automatically scan in-game data by manipulating your mouse movements, taking screenshots of the game, and then scanning information from those screenshots. These are low-risk tools that can help you automate a lot of manual process with scanning artifacts for GO. As any tools that indirectly interact with the game, althought their usage is virtually undetectable, <1>there could still be risk with using them. Users discretion is advised.<2>The most important aspect of using these Scanners with GO is the output format:<3><0><0>As of <1>v5.21.0, GO can import artifact data in the <3>mona-uranai format. <1>As of <1>v6.0.0, GO can import data in the <3>Genshin Open Object Description (GOOD) format.<4>Below are several scanners that have been tested with GO.<5>To upload the exported file, go to <1>Settings page, and upload your file in the Database Upload section.

ik.title: Inventory Kamera
ik.p1: This light-weight app will scan all your characters + weapons + artifacts in your inventory. Follow the instrutions in the app to set it up. This scanner only scans in english.
ik.p2: This scanner can also scan materials for <1>Seelie.me</1>
ik.p3: This scanner only scans in english, and exports to GOOD format by default.

as.title: AdeptiScanner
as.p1: Scans all your artifacts in inventory. Has a manual scanning mode.
as.p2: This scanner can also be configured for new artifacts in new game versions without needing an update.

am.title: 「天目」-- Amenoma
am.p1: Scans all you artifacts in your inventory. Follow the instruction to capture the window and scan. Has both Chinese and English version. (Download the <1>_EN.exe</1> version to scan in english). Both the <3>mona-uranai</3> and <5>GOOD</5> format is accepted in GO. the <7>GOOD</7> format is recommended.
am.p2: Beta version of this scanner can also scan materials for <1>Seelie.me</1>
am.p3: Please feel free to join their discord if you find any bugs. They are in need of more english testers.

goodeng: This scanner only scans in english, and exports to GOOD format.
